name: MADLOX PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE
desc:
Implement crafting interpreters by robert nystrom.
Creating programing language from scratch. first implement a Tree-walk Interpreter using Java. second implement a Bytecode Virtual machine using C.

name: INSTABOT
desc:
bot for auto like, auto follow and auto comment.
I create web crawler using Selenium and Ruby. Perform some human like interaction such as like , message, and follow someone IG account

name: INSTANALITIC
desc:
instagram users Analytic.
As a continuation of the bot project, i build an app to analyze instagram users based on their image post tags. collect bunch of data using bot, cleaning the data and analize it using clustering algorithm

name: KNN ALGORITHM
desc:
the k-nearest neighbors algorithm (k-NN) is a non-parametric method used for classification and regression.
I applied this algorithm in scholarship awarding to determine whether students were entitled to receive scholarships by assessing the proximity of their data to the data records of experts, based on Euclidean distances.

name: TREND LEAST SQUARE (TLS)
desc:
Least Square is the method for finding the best fit of a set of data points.
I apply this algorithm to predict how many product sales for the next month, which will be used as the basis for determining product stock.

name: MUEZZA RUN
desc:
endless run game, collect coins and exchange it with game city tokens .
I create an endless running game using Unity 3D and program it using C# language
